Description.Text: The cosy 3-star Palmalife hotel promises a pleasant stay and excellent service in the heart of Istanbul. This charming hotel is ideally positioned for travelling around this historic city. The hotel sits between the popular Eminonu and Faith districts, within walking distance of the seafront and Taksim Square, where visitors can sample the modern side of Turkey. Various transport links are close, including bus, underground and tramway, meaning no part of this majestic city is out of reach. There are no leisure facilities onsite but free Wi-Fi is available in the hotel's public areas for added convenience. Other services including babysitting, car rentals, ironing and laundry ensure a pleasant stay. Guests can enjoy authentic Turkish delicacies and international cuisine in an open buffet style in the hotel restaurant, and delicious cocktails can be sipped in the bar and lobby. The standard rooms are air-conditioned and decorated in a simple but tasteful fashion. They are equipped with a satellite TV and fee Wi-Fi. The hotel offers 24-hour room service and an airport transfer service from its tour desk.
